li.class: mega-menu-item mega-menu-item-type-post_type mega-menu-item-object-page mega-menu-item-has-children mega-menu-megamenu mega-align-bottom-left mega-menu-grid mega-menu-item-37

li.h4: CHILDREN CAN DO MORE THAN THEY THINK THEY CAN

p.a: We encourage our students to think critically and take active roles in their classrooms and communities while performing in an academically challenging curriculum. The results are high-achieving students with the character, habits of scholarship and ethical foundation to be inspired leaders in our changing world.

li.class: mega-menu-item mega-menu-item-type-post_type mega-menu-item-object-page mega-menu-item-has-children mega-menu-megamenu mega-align-bottom-left mega-menu-grid mega-menu-item-36

li.a: General Q and A about Charter Schools

p.a: Real-time access for parents to their child’s grades, attendance, assignments, and more. For more information on the Parent Portal contact the front office 413-366-5100.

div.p: We are eager to accommodate your needs, questions, and concerns in the most efficient manner. The BACPS staff communicates often to keep parents informed of school events and procedures. Because our primary concern is the well-being and education of our students, the BACPS staff is committed to open, honest communication with parents.

h2.a: Inspired Leaders for our Changing World

div.class: et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_blurb_extended et_pb_blurb_extended_1 et_animated et_clickable et_pb_text_align_center

div.p: Baystate Academy Charter Public School prides itself in welcoming parent participation and involvement.

div.class: et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_blurb_extended et_pb_blurb_extended_2 et_animated et_clickable et_pb_text_align_center

div.p: Stay connected with all of our current events and announcements.

div.class: et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_blurb_extended et_pb_blurb_extended_3 et_animated et_clickable et_pb_text_align_center
et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_0 et_animated et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_center

div.p: Baystate Academy Charter Public School (BACPS) is honored to give Springfield students and their parents a choice in education. We support students in grades 6 – 12 who are interested in preparing for college through our proven, interdisciplinary curriculum that offers enriched experiences in HEALTH SCIENCES. Our staff and faculty at BACPS are committed to providing a culture that results in high-achieving students with the character, habits of scholarship, and an ethical foundation to be inspired leaders in our changing world.

p.b: Baystate Academy Charter Public School does not discriminate on the basis of religion, race, color, national origin age, sex or disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, military family status, in admission or access to, or treatment or employment in its programs and activities.

div.class: et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_1 et_animated et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_left

h2.span: LEARNING IS REAL-WORLD, CHALLENGING, ACTIVE AND COLLABORATIVE

div.p: Serving students from across Springfield, Baystate Academy Charter Public School (BACPS) is a rigorous college-preparatory school with a focus on health sciences. We currently offer grades 6–12. We graduated our first class of seniors in 2019; 100 percent were accepted to two-and-four year colleges.

In addition to our health-sciences focus, BACPS uses the EL Education model, a nationally recognized style of teaching that unlocks students’ potential with project-based learning, and supports them to achieve more than they thought was possible.

College and career success is increasingly dependent on skills that go beyond content knowledge. Through hands-on experience, students design expeditions, lead whole-school meetings, and facilitate student/parent conferences. Our approach strengthens essential skills such as leadership, effective communication and collaboration, time management, and accountability.

div.class: et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_2 et_animated et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_left

div.h2: POSITIVE CHANGE STARTS WITH RIGOROUS EXPECTATIONS
div.p: BACPS offers a curriculum that challenges students with real-world problems while building key life skills including perseverance, self-advocacy, and collaboration. Our students will learn the compassion, integrity, and confidence needed for achieving success in school, at work, and in life.

div.class: et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_3 et_animated et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_left

div.p: BACPS is focused on healthcare careers, science, and math. We’re a college-preparatory school. We chose this broad curriculum for its power to challenge students, ground learning with real experience, and benefit the whole community.

BACPS students make deep connections while engaging in creative problem-solving and rigorous inquiry. Whether exploring the causes or possible cures for cancer, conducting experiments on pathogens, or writing a play promoting healthy lifestyles, BACPS students learn to engage with the world with strong skills and a clear sense of purpose.
